cab.content: SECRET WAR OABDIST.0.T.1131.PRISOUESS OP WAR.Bote by Lord tfewton. End June, 1917.As the British delegates will he celled upon todiscuss exchanges with the Germans within two or three days,it is most important that the? should ho instructed iomedi-ately as to what line they are to adopt if the Germans makesimilar proposals to thoso which have recently been agreedto by the Prench,It would save much time if these instructionscould be sent to the Eague without waiting for inquiriesfrom the delegates.(signed) Hewton.2, Whitehall Gardens, 3.W.
